U

update() - Method in class controller.ViewController
This method is called by a ScheduledService and calls other methods that are required
First we call ViewController.fitToView() (if the Fit To View ToggleButton is selected ) to resize the board and position it on the center of the Canvas.
update() - Method in interface model.gameoflife.algorithms.Algorithm
Method that runs the algorithm
update() - Method in class model.gameoflife.algorithms.Default
This method checks if we need to expand the game board and runs Default.countNeighbours(int, int), Default.nextGeneration(int, int) which is our algorithm.
update() - Method in class model.gameoflife.GameOfLife
This method is run before the algorithm to check whether we need to expand or shrink the game board
updateConcurrent(int, int, int, int, CyclicBarrier) - Method in interface model.gameoflife.algorithms.Algorithm
Method that runs the algorithm multithreaded
updateConcurrent(int, int, int, int, CyclicBarrier) - Method in class model.gameoflife.algorithms.Default
This is the concurrent version of our algorithm and each thread will call this method and run the algorithm on a specified segment of the game board.
updateNeighbours(int, int) - Method in class model.gameoflife.algorithms.Default
Method that adds neighbors to the neighbor array
updateStrip() - Method in class controller.EditorController
This method updates the strip view with the current pattern when the user clicks a button.
updateWithThreads() - Method in class model.gameoflife.GameOfLife
This is the threaded method that is run before the algorithm to check whether we need to expand or shrink the game board
